description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget named OceanInput, which is a styled text input field with customizable properties such as controller, hint text, keyboard type, obscurity, and change callback.

classes.name: OceanInput
classes.description: A styled text input widget with rounded corners, customizable via parameters, used for user text entry in Flutter applications.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the Flutter widget tree for OceanInput, returning a TextField with specified decorations and behaviors.
